page.title: 04Palmers Green-Housing
page.content: The average cost of housing in Palmers Green 1985 is Â£58,500 and Â£41,250 for flats. The demand for houses is greater than for flats. Lindsey Court,Crestbrook Place,Hertford Court and Pellipar Close are all private blocks of flats off Green Lanes. In Pellipar Close there are about 15 private Old People's Homes which are looked after by a warden. In Glebe Court, behind St.John's Church there are a few old people's flats which are run by a Trust and looked after by a warden. The Neighbourhood Care is a voluntary service run to look after old people who live in their own homes. Houses in this area date from the 1920's. The latest developments 6years ago in Hoppers Rd. Most houses are owner occupied and consist of 5/6rooms, bathroom and kitchen.
